resources.string:
This functionality is currently experimental. 
The app might crash or the data transfer might abort at any time without warning. 
If you encounter an issue, please report it directly via GitHub! 
https://github.com/ShortDevelopment/Nearby-Sharing-Windows/issues

Because of privacy concerns (ads), android does not allow apps to read the bluetooth mac address any more. 
The mac address is required to tell the other device where to send your data. 
To proceed, please insert your bluetooth mac address below. 
If this address is invalid, you will not be able to receive any data.
